en-US.summary: Listen to Maxi 80, the best music from the eighties.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio
en-US.name: Maxi 80
en-US.description:
Listen to Maxi80, the premiere 80's french web radio.

Maxi80 provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music from the eighties.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Maxi80" or "Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"

en-GB.summary: Listen to Maxi 80, the best music from the eighties.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio
en-GB.name: Maxi 80
en-GB.description:
Listen to Maxi80, the premiere 80's french web radio.

Maxi80 provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music from the eighties.

Maxi80 is a french speaking radio - please expect DJ's, ads and Alexa cards to be published in french.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Maxi80" or "Alexa, ask Maxi80 to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"

fr-FR.summary: Écoutez Maxi 80, la meilleure musique des années 80.
examplePhrases: Alexa, demande à Maxi80 de lancer la radio
fr-FR.name: Maxi 80
fr-FR.description:
Écoutez Maxi 80, la première radio des années 80 en France.

Maxi 80 vous permet d'écouter 24 heures sur 24 la meilleure musique des années 80 en haute fidélité.

Pour démarrer, dites "Alexa, démarre Maxi 80" ou "Alexa, lance Maxi 80".

À tout moment, vous pouvez arrêter ("Alexa, stop") ou changer le volume ("Alexa, augmente le volume" ou "Alexa, diminue le volume")

it-IT.summary: Ascolta Maxi 80, la migliore musica degli anni ottanta.
examplePhrases: Alexa, chiedi a Maxi80 di avviare la radio
Alexa, chiedi a Maxi80 di giocare
it-IT.name: Maxi 80
it-IT.description:
Ascolta Maxi80, la prima web radio francese degli anni '80.

Maxi80 offre un suono di alta qualità 24/7 con la migliore musica degli anni ottanta.

Per iniziare, basta dire "Alexa, apri Maxi80" or "Alexa, chiedi a Maxi80 di avviare la radio".

In qualsiasi momento, puoi interrompere la radio dicendo "Alexa, basta"

es-ES.summary: Escucha maxi ochentas, la mejor música de los ochentas.
examplePhrases: Alexa, pide a Maxi80 poner la radio
es-ES.name: Maxi 80
es-ES.description:
Escucha Maxi80, la primera web radio ochentera en Francia.

Maxi80 te pone sonido de alta calidad 24/7 con la mejor música de los ochentas.

Para empezar, solo tienes que decir "Alexa, abre Maxi80" o "Alexa, pide a Maxi80 poner la radio".

En cualquier momento, tu puedes parar la radio diciendo "Alexa, para"

Only change in Lambda function ARN to use versioning and aliases

Initial Instructions:
I am the official developer for Maxi 80 app, I developed the iOS and Android App.

I submitted the authorisation letter on caseID 2113239251

Here is a copy :

From: "Webradio Maxi80.com" <info@maxi80.com>
To: sebastien.stormacq@gmail.com
Subject: Authorization to use the Maxi80.com trademark on Amazon services

I, Lionel Soriano, President of Nouvtech-Association Nouvelles Technologies, owner of maxi80.com, hereby authorises Mr Sebastien Stormacq to publish the Maxi80 Alexa Skill.  

I confirm I granted Sebastien Stormacq perpetual rights to use the logo, name and audio stream from maxi80.com for the Alexa skill, in the US and other countries where Alexa is or will be available.



Montpellier, March 14th 2017



Lionel SORIANO,

Nouvtech Association Nouvelles Technologies
